meanings.definition: Not capable of returning to its original shape or size after being stretched or compressed.
meanings.sent1: The nonelastic rubber band stayed stretched out and did not bounce back.
meanings.sent2: The nonelastic rope could not be easily stretched to reach the other side.
meanings.sent3: The nonelastic pants were so tight, they felt like they were hugging my legs.
meanings.sent4: His nonelastic thinking refused to bend even when faced with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The nonelastic clay hardened quickly and could not be reshaped.

meanings.sent1: The nonelastic fabric tore easily when pulled.
meanings.sent2: The nonelastic band could not be stretched to fit around the box.
meanings.sent3: The nonelastic ruler refused to bend, making it difficult to measure curves.
meanings.sent4: Her nonelastic schedule left no room for unexpected plans.
meanings.sent5: The nonelastic rubber ball barely bounced, unlike the bouncy ones.
